News.Title: PRECOT Reports Mixed Q1 Results with Declining Net Profit but Improved EBITDA Margins
News.Summary: PRECOT reported Q1 consolidated net profit of ₹113 million, down from ₹145 million in the same period last year. However, the company showed improvement in operational efficiency with EBITDA rising 12.86% to ₹285.3 million compared to ₹253 million year-over-year. EBITDA margin expanded significantly to 13.85% from 8.21% in the previous year, representing a 68.64% increase in margin performance.
